content.question: Based on the results of the paper chromatography experiment shown above, which of the following can be concluded about the dye?

choices.label: It has a small molar mass.
It has a weaker attraction for the stationary phase that it has for the mobile phase.
It has a stronger attraction for the stationary phase than it has for the mobile phase.

content.answer: It has a weaker attraction for the stationary phase that it has for the mobile phase.

skill.text: 2.D: Make observations or collect data from representations of laboratory setups or results, while attending to precision where appropriate.
